dmca.title: pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Chansonette Connolly [mailto:cconnolly@symantec.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 05, 2005 10:55 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fw: pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126
Importance: High




----- Forwarded by Chansonette Connolly/Cupertino/Cal/SYMANTEC on 04/05/2005
08:44 AM ----- 

Chansonette Connolly/Cupertino/Cal/SYMANTEC 


04/05/2005 08:06 AM 


To
abuse@theplanet.com 

cc
mightyllc@yahoo.com 

Subject
pcAnywhere.com - IP Address 70.85.18.126

        



ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
TPCM 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 

Gentlepersons: 

I am writing on behalf of Symantec Corporation. Symantec owns the trademarks
and holds the copyrights for numerous computer software products, including,
but not limited to, a suite of computer utility and antivirus software
products under the U.S. registered trademarks pcAnywhereR, NORTON
SYSTEMWORKSR and NORTON ANTIVIRUSR, and other trademarks.  Symantec also
holds the registered trademark in the U.S. and other countries for its name,
SYMANTECR.  Symantec's rights are evidenced by, among other things,
registrations of its trademarks with the United States Patent and Trademark
Office.  Please note:  the name "pcAnywhere" was registered in the United
States Patent and Trademark Office on July 13, 1993, registration number
1781148.  Symantec owns the trademark, which continues to be in full force
and effect. 

The website referenced above that you are hosting is in violation of
Symantec Corporation's trademark rights as follows: The domain name of the
Website infringes Symantec Corporation's trademark rights by trading off the
goodwill established in the "pcANYWHERE" mark for the purpose of
misleadingly directing traffic to the Website.  Further, the domain name of
the Website contains our trademark pcAnywhereR, constitutes an unauthorized
use and infringement, and creates customer confusion as to the source and
sponsor of the Website.  In fact we have received complaints about this
site's creation of confusion.   

Based on the above, the deliberate and clear infringement of Symantec's
protected trademark rights, and the harm to Symantec's business and goodwill
from the infringing use, Symantec demands that you immediately shut down
this website and inform us when this has been done.  Symantec believes that
the entire Internet community benefits when these matters are resolved
cooperatively.  Accordingly, we appreciate your efforts toward this common
goal. 

The information contained in this notification is accurate.  Under penalty
of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Symantec with
respect to this matter. 

Please be advised that this letter is not and is not intended to be a
complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this matter or
to Symantec's positions, rights or remedies, legal or equitable, all of
which are specifically reserved. 

Sincerely,


  _____  

  

Chansonette Connolly         Symantec logo 

Manager, Worldwide Brand Protection 

Legal Department 

Symantec Corporation 

Office:         (408) 517-8045 

Interoffice:         6 [408] 8045 

Fax:         (408) 517-8121 

Email:          <mailto:chansonette_connolly@symantec.com>
chansonette_connolly@symantec.com 

 <http://www.symantec.com/> www.symantec.com


This message (including any attachments) is intended only for the use of the
individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information
that is non-public, proprietary, privileged, confidential, and exempt from
disclosure under applicable law or may constitute as attorney work product.
If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use,
dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly
prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, notify us
immediately by telephone and (i) destroy this message if a facsimile or (ii)
delete this message immediately if this is an electronic communication.
Thank you.
